abf1bd02-5461-4adb-ae6a-e4aedc1eb7b5.name: Single-Minded
abf1bd02-5461-4adb-ae6a-e4aedc1eb7b5.notes: +3 to rolls for any lengthy mental task you concentrate on to the exclusion of other activities, if the GM feels such focus would be beneficial. You tend to ignore everything else while obsessed and have -5 to all rolls to notice interruptions.

238b8f25-5f4c-4b78-b013-4f669493bcf2.name: Specialized
238b8f25-5f4c-4b78-b013-4f669493bcf2.notes: @Type: Angels, Demons, Elementals, Faerie, Ghosts, etc.@

38e2c0cd-0b33-4d58-905f-6594576de0dd.name: Reaction Bonus
38e2c0cd-0b33-4d58-905f-6594576de0dd.notes: Students of the arcane, gullible college students, monster-hunters.

2c31912d-738b-4a69-86cd-7168d0e7aa68.name: Alternative Benefit
2c31912d-738b-4a69-86cd-7168d0e7aa68.notes: +1/level to Fright Checks caused by supernatural beings and effects, and by reading sanity-destroying tomes (because you know what to expect).

e0ee7292-6088-4986-ab10-4fddd1dff769.name: Reaction Bonus
e0ee7292-6088-4986-ab10-4fddd1dff769.notes: Students of the arcane, gullible college students, monster-hunters.

0b1f2327-1fd0-41a2-98b4-0b542956ccd4.notes: +1/level to Fright Checks caused by supernatural beings and effects, and by reading sanity-destroying tomes (because you know what to expect).
